item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Renax, post:43, topic:3916”]Congratulations on what you did get accomplished, i was never really to intrested in alfhelm but i did check it out once and awhile when i was bored, this might just be me but it was hard to have hope in a mmorpg with a 2 man development team :rolleyes:.

victor is an asshole but he’s still a good guy, and most people just take him for an asshole and slander him on various forums :P. it also seems that victor is only in it for the fact that being on a 2 man development team for a mmorpg isn’t on most programmers resumes :)[/quote]

2-man full time team, but we had some dude called david who literally has typed out like 50 pages(in MSword-sized format) of storyline, quest ideas, skills, etc… Then we have two users who were making us a lot of 3D models, and then We had a guy who recently started doing concept art for us, etc… Our community was great because everyone liked to help out.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Congratulations on what you did get accomplished, i was never really to intrested in alfhelm but i did check it out once and awhile when i was bored, this might just be me but it was hard to have hope in a mmorpg with a 2 man development team :rolleyes:.

victor is an asshole but he’s still a good guy, and most people just take him for an asshole and slander him on various forums :P. it also seems that victor is only in it for the fact that being on a 2 man development team for a mmorpg isn’t on most programmers resumes

item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

MujaheD:

neither links work but by the sound of it you quite your afelhem project. Honestly i think everyone quits alot, i quit 60% of my projects. At times like these its best to burn everything you have onto a CD and store it in a cupboard, you’ll regret it if you throw it away because chances are you’ll come back. Good luck in the future and just think about what you have learned

The second link is working fine for me?

item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

bullzeye95:

Sorry Jme, this off-topic as well as off-mood, but what do YOU use to make 3D graphics for Afelhem?

I’m still a bit of a noobie in 3D modelling, although I enjoy it a lot. We have members such as PeeGee and Nate who make us models, Nate used 3dsmax, PeeGee uses blender. We buy a lot of models from other people, such as arteria-gaming

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’m giving it another try. First day of Setember I’m coming back, and he’s gonna continue on with the game working on it just so that it runs faster. We were still kinda noobies at first so it was pretty memory intensive and stuff.

Waffen, I’ll see about it later… lol I’ve got a lot of preperations to work on.

item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:19, topic:3916”]Lol I need advice.

Victor took it alright, he just keeps on begging for me to come back. he said we could take a few moths off and see if we want to continue it. he said he’ll never act immature on the forums ever again and he’ll be nice to everyone. He is sounding mature enough in his emails and I could always try it and leave if he acts up again. But im not sure.

He also said he’ll do my site for me, and host it and everything and he’ll be mature on it too. I just dont know if I can trust him, should I give him another try?[/quote]
If you ask me, I think you should. Even the most retarded people deserve their second chance.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of the road
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

Sorry to see Afelhem go, but it’s understandable, hope that Victor picks the message up and leaves it.

Btw: If you’re going on with that side about moddeling, mind if I join you? :), I used to make models for a pro game studio, i’m known with 3DMAX, Maya and more.

Drop me a message ;).
